Description: THE 9 11 MEMORIAL ACT GRANT PROGRAM PROVIDES COMPETITIVE GRANTS FOR THE CONTINUED OPERATION, SECURITY, AND MAINTENANCE OF THE ON SITE MEMORIALS OF THE EVENTS AND VICTIMS OF THE SEPTEMBER 11, 2001  FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS GRANT, THESE ON SITE MEMORIALS ARE REFERRED TO AS  COVERED MEMORIALS   A  COVERED MEMORIAL  IS DEFINED AS A MEMORIAL LOCATED IN THE UNITED STATES ESTABLISHED TO COMMEMORATE THE EVENTS OF, AND HONOR THE VICTIMS OF, THE TERRORISTATTACKS ON THE WORLD TRADE CENTER AND PENTAGON ON SEPTEMBER 11, 2001, AT THE SITES OF THE ATTACKS
